item.description:
This Saturday will be a day like no other in TMIRCE history. For the first time, we will run a different route that will require cunning and majestic hooting and hollering. 

The Yankees are in town and to celebrate, we'll run to Fenway Park and mix it up with those Red Sox fans. Although the route will be different the, spirit and breakfast will be the same.

(Please RSVP)

A few reasons why this run will be awesome:

  • City Sports' donation of four pairs of New Balance 890's to raffle off
  • Cliff Bar and their amazing munchies will be there
  • We may even have a special guest giving away super secret things (so secret you  may not even know about it)

So Meet up with The Most Informal Running Club Ever on the Boston side of the Charles River for the weekly Saturday Fun Run.  

Confused by the number of RSVP's?

We actually draw on average 50 TMIRCE'ers. That's you! So don't be timid. There are plenty of friendly people to meet or just blend in with.

What to expect: a seriously fun group of runners who definitely do not take running too seriously. We will meet, chat, RUN, stretch, chat, EAT BREAKFAST and then leave. It's that easy.

(Please RSVP)

Breakfast Details: Between 11:15 and 11:30 (depending on how long we run) we will meet at CITY SPORTS @ BU* for breakfast. If you would like to bring a breakfast item to share (eggs, bagels, fruits, muffins, juice, bacon, potatoes, etc.) please feel free to do so. You are not obligated to bring anything, though, so please join us for breakfast after the run!

ALL ABILITY LEVELS ARE WELCOME!!!

Meter parking is easily accessible on Comm Ave. and also Gardner St. which runs parallel behind the store. The B train on the Green Line stops directly across from the store at Babcock St.

* "The Rock" has moved to CITY SPORTS located at the intersection of Commonwealth Ave. and Babcock St.

informalrunning.com

Read the BLOG

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: TMIRCE Saturdays @ City Sports SPECIAL EVENT
